copy.cupcakesForWildernessOnly: You can only eat cupcakes while adventuring in the Wilderness!
copy.dropgameforHomeOrGarden: Oops! You can only play Party Games while you are in your Home or Garden.
copy.dropgameHasPlaceholder: Oops! Please set the current game before adding a new one.
copy.dropgameTooManyTables: Oops! You have the maximum amount of games allowed at one time.
copy.dropgameHasActiveMeadowGame: Oops! You are already joining a game, please quit out of that game before adding a new one.
copy.plantingRequiresGarden: You need to be in your garden to plant Surprise Seeds.
copy.plantingRequiresSelectedPlot: Click on an empty Planting Patch to use Surprise Seeds.
copy.seedPurchaseInstructions: You don't have any seeds. Would you like to visit Garden Supply to get seeds?
